name: Spinny Saws
description:
Spinning Saws is a single-player game based on the prompt of a 1-button game. In this game, the player will control the circular saw by aiming, shooting and stopping it, all with a simple left-mouse click.

Controls:

  • Click to Choose Position
  • Click for Force and Angle
  • Click to Freeze

Made by harristsui and Jib Leekitwattana
